CustomField.formula: IF(OR(simplesurvey__Case__r.Client_Support_Team_CST__c = "Single(k)", TEXT(simplesurvey__Case__r.Department__c) = "Single(k)"), "SingleK", IF(simplesurvey__Case__r.Case_Team__c = "Saver Success", "Saver", IF(simplesurvey__Case__r.Case_Team__c = "Payroll", "Payroll", IF(OR(simplesurvey__Case__r.Case_Team__c = "Client Support", simplesurvey__Case__r.Case_Team__c = "Platinum Servicing"), "CST", IF( simplesurvey__Case__r.RecordType.Name = "Implementations Cases", "Implementations", IF( ISBLANK(Implementation__c) = False, "Implementations", "Other"))))))
CustomField.label: Team
